item.description:
Retirement Plans and Real Estate: These two can make a happy marriage or create financial distress.

Learn how proper planning can avoid problems and pitfalls anc create greater opportunities for financial success.

Chris Williams and Glenn Noland of Baystate Financial Services will provide information about an Individual 401(k) account that may be able to help you to access your qualified retirement money via loan so as to avoid taxes and penalties.

Monthly Meeting

6:30 PM, Thursday, June 16, 2011

Doubletree Suites, 400 Soldiers Field Road, Boston, MA

Free for members; $25 for nonmembers

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association Monthly Meetup
